channel.title: Staff delete please not releasing now im coding it more
channel.description:
HI guys and Welcome Today, Thanks for visiting my post please read this before downloading or commenting.. I have been a very weak coder and i have never gave up, guys you will probably see this source and say its crap- I agree it might be crap or not soo good but i tried my best, maybe hopefully in V2 it will be better thats if you guys would like a v2. Anyways...
This is my first release i used (insidiax v1 317 PI) base and coded it and now releasing it. I taught it would be a good idea since it is hard to find insidiax v1 nowadays but mine is also coded So it is better anyways the link will be replaced once in a while to stay active.
Client, Webclient, Jar client, source, cache all are in one package in this link below..
========================================================================================================
Source,client&amp;amp;cache LINK: will be out in 1week sorry guys making the server better :D ======================================================================================================
BTW just to let you all know the name of this server before was (barracuda-x before and we changed it to project-dice/project dice) i created it with (spencer & tim )but then tim decided to ditch us and wanted full credits and wanted it for himself so we said no and us 2 decided to release it out.
Here below i am going to see you some features that i have added ontop of the source.. ---
(What i was going to Do/Add do but didn't)
Add FULLscreen to client, Update graphics, Add SOF, Add even more customs, Add GE, Add staff list on tab, Add quests, Change more item stats, Re-write mage skill, Fix (i buy anything shop) glitch... Add NEX - - Maybe hopefully we will do all of the un-did stuff and more in next release. if you guys like this release.
(what has been added ontop of base by me) fixed skillcape shop, fixed korasi spec, whip spec, ::spec command = unlimited spec GS specs all working , dds, &amp;amp; all dragons and chaotics/rapiers/primal/torva/customs.... ::god so you have unlimited HP = for owners only added soo many commands and shops/items its actually insane check it out change some item stats, added black phat, and pink dildo, added a'lot of custom zones and tele's, added alot of shops here and there, added prestiging, changed the whole commands.java added a'alot more things added custom dung, added bosses, fixed funpk, edited cache, change the whole (::yell) command, Added my own dice command, changed donorzone shops, added alot of npc here and there added custom training area ::train, added basic new interfaces, fixed cache, fixed interface tabs, fixed spirit shields, fixed pk points and pkp points, added dragon kiteshield, added steadfeast boots, added custom yoyo and candy cane, changed client background, 99 announcements, login/logout announcements, new player joins and new player leaves announcements, added soo many commands in commands.java (source side) OFC, basic/advanced coding done to it, added a'lot more check it out and see..,, and as for commands i have not made a list im sorry you have to look it in commands.java..
============================================================================================
i'm going to post some pics below here so you guys can see the rsps more and the shops/tele's and also below i'm going to post some of the features it had before i added everything.
-================================================================================================= [InsidiaX v1 features)
-602 Skill Interface -Fading Hitmarks -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -Dungeoneering FLAWLESS (8 GOOD Floors) -All Important Summoning Special Attacks -Very Advanced Dicing System -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking -Wilderness Revernants -Custom PK'ing Skill -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -90% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Vote4Cash Integrated -Fully Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape &amp;amp; More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading (Was very slow with base) -Ring of Life &amp;amp; Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -317 Classic RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters FUNPK Area -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding) -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server! -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style. -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages.
================================================================================================= OFC it uses insidiax v1 client, so if you dont like this one you can use the insidiax v1 normal client&amp;amp;cache... You might wana change cache Link and name if you want to. and guys please dont comment dumb questions like why does the compiler say (path not specified) im sure you all can figure that out.
Credits: Insidiax for base 68%, ME for coding most of it: 6% RSPSCODING for guides: 5% MOPARSCAPE: 5% RUNEL0C: 5% RUNE-SERVER: 5% Spencer for helping me with customs &amp;amp; tele's: 6%
Pictures will be posted from here on below... and im sorry i know i don't have enough pics ============================================================================================== 1st pic: http://prntscr.com/109hvv
2nd pic: http://prntscr.com/109hyi
3rd pic: http://prntscr.com/109hze
4th pic: http://prntscr.com/109i0i
Anti-virus check pic: http://prntscr.com/109jxt ================================================================================================== DL LINK: will be out in 1week sorry guys making the server better :D =================================================================================================== uppit Link: will be out in 1week sorry guys making the server better :D =================================================================================================== NO rude comments please as this is my first release if you need help with anything i will be more than happy to help you just email me and i will reply ASAP. email: piratemann7@gmail.com
SORRY PICS ARE TOO OLD I WILL HAVE TO UPDATE THEM SOON which i will.
NOTE:~~~~ NO one has the rights to re-release this anywhere else NO other rsps community for now until i decide that i want to FYI: this has been released by (*ME=MALIMT*) to MOPAR, rune-server, rune l0c,AND RSPSCODING RSPSCODING NAME: rsps-server -- just incase you are wondering ~~~~~ thankyouverymuch.

item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

HI guys and Welcome Today, Thanks for visiting my post please read this before downloading or commenting…
I have been a very weak coder and i have never gave up, guys you will probably see this source and say its crap-
I agree it might be crap or not soo good but i tried my best, maybe hopefully in V2 it will be better
thats if you guys would like a v2. Anyways…

This is my first release i used (insidiax v1 317 PI) base and coded it and now releasing it.
I taught it would be a good idea since it is hard to find insidiax v1 nowadays but mine is also coded
So it is better anyways the link will be replaced once in a while to stay active.

Client, Webclient, Jar client, source, cache all are in one package in this link below…

========================================================================================================

Source,client&amp;cache LINK: will be out in 1week sorry guys making the server better

BTW just to let you all know the name of this server before was (barracuda-x before and we changed it to project-dice/project dice)
i created it with (spencer & tim )but then tim decided to ditch us and wanted full credits and wanted it for himself so we said no and us 2 decided to release it out.

Here below i am going to see you some features that i have added ontop of the source… —

(What i was going to Do/Add do but didn’t)

Add FULLscreen to client,
Update graphics,
Add SOF,
Add even more customs,
Add GE,
Add staff list on tab,
Add quests,
Change more item stats,
Re-write mage skill,
Fix (i buy anything shop) glitch…
Add NEX

  • Maybe hopefully we will do all of the un-did stuff and more in next release. if you guys like this release.

(what has been added ontop of base by me)
fixed skillcape shop,
fixed korasi spec,
whip spec,
::spec command = unlimited spec
GS specs all working , dds, &amp; all dragons and chaotics/rapiers/primal/torva/customs…
::god so you have unlimited HP = for owners only
added soo many commands and shops/items its actually insane check it out
change some item stats,
added black phat, and pink dildo,
added a’lot of custom zones and tele’s,
added alot of shops here and there,
added prestiging,
changed the whole commands.java added a’alot more things
added custom dung,
added bosses,
fixed funpk,
edited cache,
change the whole (::yell) command,
Added my own dice command,
changed donorzone shops,
added alot of npc here and there
added custom training area ::train,
added basic new interfaces,
fixed cache,
fixed interface tabs,
fixed spirit shields,
fixed pk points and pkp points,
added dragon kiteshield,
added steadfeast boots,
added custom yoyo and candy cane,
changed client background,
99 announcements,
login/logout announcements,
new player joins and new player leaves announcements,
added soo many commands in commands.java (source side) OFC,
basic/advanced coding done to it,
added a’lot more check it out and see…,
and as for commands i have not made a list im sorry you have to look it in commands.java…

============================================================================================

i’m going to post some pics below here so you guys can see the rsps more and the shops/tele’s
and also below i’m going to post some of the features it had before i added everything.

-=================================================================================================
[InsidiaX v1 features)

-602 Skill Interface
-Fading Hitmarks
-Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses.
-Combat Icons Next to Damage
-Dungeoneering FLAWLESS (8 GOOD Floors)
-All Important Summoning Special Attacks
-Very Advanced Dicing System
-10Man “Raid” Style Bosses
-Nomad
-Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking
-Wilderness Revernants
-Custom PK’ing Skill
-Elite Slayer Tasks
-All NPC’s around the World
-More Advanaced Skilling than PI
-FULLY working Overloads 100% RS
-39 Jad Waves, Custom
-Unique Custom Home
-Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging!
-100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)!
-PKP Shops
-90% Corrected Item Stats
-Even More NPC Anims Added
-Player Owned Shops
-Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded
-PERFECT Bridding / Switching
-Vote4Cash Integrated
-Fully Webclient Ready
-Soulwars Cape &amp; More Items Added
-Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect’s)
-Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat)
-Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated
-Instant Loading (Was very slow with base)
-Ring of Life &amp; Slayer Helmet Effects
-Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces
-317 Classic RS Graphics
-Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces
-NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE
-Working Spirit Shield Effects
-Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects
-Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields
-NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED
-602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters
-Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother!
-Donaters FUNPK Area
-Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding)
-Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP
-Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server
-Near Flawless Combat System
-Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow
-Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring
-Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server!
-Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild)
-Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style.
-Real RS Barrage Orb’s for non freezing barrages.

=================================================================================================
OFC it uses insidiax v1 client, so if you dont like this one you can use the insidiax v1 normal client&amp;cache…
You might wana change cache Link and name if you want to.
and guys please dont comment dumb questions like why does the compiler say (path not specified)
im sure you all can figure that out.

Credits: Insidiax for base 68%,
ME for coding most of it: 6%
RSPSCODING for guides: 5%
MOPARSCAPE: 5%
RUNEL0C: 5%
RUNE-SERVER: 5%
Spencer for helping me with customs &amp; tele’s: 6%

Pictures will be posted from here on below… and im sorry i know i don’t have enough pics

1st pic: http://prntscr.com/109hvv

2nd pic: http://prntscr.com/109hyi

3rd pic: http://prntscr.com/109hze

4th pic: http://prntscr.com/109i0i

Anti-virus check pic: http://prntscr.com/109jxt

DL LINK: will be out in 1week sorry guys making the server better

uppit Link: will be out in 1week sorry guys making the server better

NO rude comments please as this is my first release if you need help with anything i will be more than happy to help you just email me and i will reply ASAP.
email: piratemann7@gmail.com

SORRY PICS ARE TOO OLD I WILL HAVE TO UPDATE THEM SOON which i will.

NOTE:~~~~ NO one has the rights to re-release this anywhere else NO other rsps community for now until i decide that i want to
FYI: this has been released by (ME=MALIMT) to MOPAR, rune-server, rune l0c,AND RSPSCODING
RSPSCODING NAME: rsps-server – just incase you are wondering
